data.title: JPMorgan: Bitcoin (BTC) Could Hit $170K If Valued Like Gold
data.description: According to JPMorgan strategist Nikolaos Panigirtzoglou, the price of Bitcoin, the leading cryptocurrency by market cap, could theoretically reach the $170,000 level if it gets valued the same as gold. This is not a prediction, but a theoretical comparison to show Bitcoin’s upside potential.The st…
